@@ -3,7 +3,18 @@
 
 
 # solution
 ```python
-```
-# Merge the Tools!
-LINK <https://www.hackerrank.com/challenges/merge-the-tools/>
\ No newline at end of file
+def merge_the_tools(string, k):
+    t = []
+    i = 0
+    while i < len(string):
+        t.append(string[i:i+k])
+        i = i + k
+
+    for i in t:
+        temp = []
+        for c in i:
+            if c not in temp:
+                temp.append(c)
+        print(''.join(temp))
+```
